original_text: King Belshazzar gave a big party for 1,000 important people in his country. He drank wine with all of them.
korean_text: 벨사살 왕이 그의 귀족 천 명을 위하여 큰 잔치를 베풀고 그 천 명 앞에서 술을 마시니라

sentences.original_text: King Belshazzar gave a big party
for 1,000 important people in his country
He drank wine with all of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들 모두와 함께 포도주를 마셨습니다
